title: doc for filepath.Clean links to an invalid url for Pike's "Lexical File Names in Plan 9 or Getting Dot-Dot Right"
body:
https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Clean:

    See also Rob Pike, “Lexical File Names in Plan 9 or Getting Dot-Dot Right,” http://plan9.bell-labs.com/sys/doc/lexnames.html

This link comes back with:
```
Object not found

The object /sys/doc/lexnames.html does not exist on this server.
errstr: '/usr/web/sys' i/o on hungup channel
uri host: 
header host: plan9.bell-labs.com
actual host: plan9.bell-labs.com
```
